content:
Estimated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: It's bad to intentionally harm others.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 2:
Text: It's rude to judge people based on superficial characteristics like height.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 3:
Text: You should always help out your family when they need it.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 4:
Text: You should always clean your room.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 5:
Text: You should obey your parents.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 6:
Text: It's fine to be apprehensive before an interview.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 7:
Text: It's wrong to joke about suicide.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 8:
Text: It is wise to do your school work.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 9:
Text: You shouldn't get involved in family drama if you can help it.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 10:
Text: You don't have to greet anyone that you don't want to.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 11:
Text: You shouldn't see sad movies if you don't like them.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 12:
Text: It's understandable to want to spend holidays with family.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 13:
Text: It's understandable to be angry if your significant other didn't do something for you on a special day.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 14:
Text: It's okay to expect people no matter who they are to obey the law.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 15:
Text: It's bad to make patrons of a business feel unwelcome.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 16:
Text: It is good to stop eating subway if it ruins your life.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 17:
Text: You shouldn't take part in competitions if you don't feel well.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 18:
Text: You should remove channels you don't watch from your cable package.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 19:
Text: People should carry insurance in case they get into an accident.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 20:
Text: You shouldn't dig up someone's awful past.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 21:
Text: It is good to be creative.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 22:
Text: You shouldn't exclude your child from a family photo.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 23:
Text: You should ask for help if you're depressed
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 24:
Text: It is okay to expect neighbors to be respectful
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 25:
Text: It's normal to dislike conflict.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 26:
Text: Families should support each other.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 27:
Text: It's expected that you get a marriage license when you get married.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 28:
Text: It is wrong to insult others.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 29:
Text: It's fine to ask your roommate for a favor.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 30:
Text: People should treat each other as equals.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Human-rated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: You shouldn't walk around in the rain, you might get sick.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 2:
Text: It is common to cancel a flight if you aren't going to use it.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 3:
Text: You should always set up an appointment before you get something done.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 4:
Text: It's bad to get angry at friends.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 5:
Text: It's good to be kind to strangers.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 6:
Text: It's understandable if you're frustrated when your relative is diagnosed with a chronic illness.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 7:
Text: It's okay for young adults to choose to live at hime.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: It's rude to make baseless accusations against another person.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 9:
Text: If you have a headache, you should take some pain medication.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 10:
Text: You're expected to spend time with your children.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 11:
Text: It's good to help a friend who is having mental health issues.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 12:
Text: It's rude to ask people their age.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 13:
Text: It's okay to laugh at something funny.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 14:
Text: You should feel distraught as a result of nightmares.
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 15:
Text: It is good to be patient.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 16:
Text: You should make an effort to go out with your parents and do things together.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 17:
Text: You should ask your significant other if it is okay to tell their parents something before doing so.
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 18:
Text: It is okay to have money problems.
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 19:
Text: It's rude to point out disabilities in others.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 20:
Text: It's kind to offer people advice when they're dealing with a problem.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 21:
Text: People should avoid getting into cars with strangers.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 22:
Text: It's good to know when something in your life isn't helping you the way you want it.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 23:
Text: You should keep your possessions in good order.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 24:
Text: It's good to be polite to salespeople.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 25:
Text: It is good to thank people for their time and effort
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 26:
Text: It's frustrating when you put more effort into a relationship than other people do.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 27:
Text: It's okay to tell someone if their partner is cheating on them.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 28:
Text: It is okay to be emotional.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 29:
Text: It's understandable to be overwhelmed by the loss of a loved one.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 30:
Text: It's good to save one's money to take a special vacation.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Target Example:
Text: It's good to want someone to do their best.
Annotation from annotator:
